title: Ticket #4390: Revert GSI_DAEMON_NAME to be unset by default
description:
Having a default value makes it harder to set X509_CERT_DIR and friends via the environment of the Condor daemons.

Since the adding of a default value was never documented, I'm inclined to not mention this in the version history.
